name: davical
description: DAViCal is a CalDAV server that allows shared calendar management for desktop and mobile clients. Designed for personal and organizational use, it integrates with clients like Thunderbird, iOS, and Android calendar apps.
features: CalDAV Server: Standard protocol for calendar synchronization. Universal compatibility.
Shared Calendars: Collaborate on schedules with teams. Coordinated planning.
Multi-Client Support: Works with Thunderbird, iOS, Android, and more. Use your favorite app.
Personal & Organizational: Suitable for individuals and businesses. Scales with needs.
Event Management: Full calendar functionality with reminders. Complete scheduling solution.
Self-Hosted: Keep your calendar data private. No cloud dependency.
